message: I was called tonight by a restricted number so I didn't answer the phone.  They left a message and said they were from Machinima and they were offering me a job.  They asked for me to call them back, only problem is that they didn't leave a number and it was restricted so I cant get it.  Hopefully they call back tomorrow and its legit instead of a prank
I hope so too! It'd be awesome to hear what Machinima is like on the inside. What kind of job were they offering?

I would be making videos of Starcraft for new players.  So kinda like noob school.  But I think someone was just pranking me.  They haven't called back yet, so IDK.  also I emailed Machinima and they said that all offers are made from messages on YouTube, not phone calls.  And I don't have my phone number on YouTube, so I think its just a prank

pretty sure its a prank now and I think I know who did it.  The day I got the call was the day he found out that I might lose my job.  I guess he thought it would be funny to tantalize me with an excellent job when the rest of my life is falling apart.  What an asshole
